Providers.openai_description: OpenAI is a global leader in AI research, with models like the GPT series.
Providers.anthropic_description: Anthropic is an AI safety and research company that builds reliable, interpretable, and steerable AI systems.
Providers.azure_description: Azure OpenAI Service provides REST API access to OpenAI's powerful language models.
Providers.vertex_description: Google Vertex AI offers access to Gemini and other powerful models from Google.
Providers.xai_description: xAI is an AI company with the mission to understand the true nature of the universe.
Providers.deepseek_description: DeepSeek is an AI company focused on AGI, offering open-source models.
Providers.mistral_description: Mistral AI provides efficient and powerful open-weight models.
Providers.openrouter_description: OpenRouter is a unified interface for top LLMs.
Providers.zhipu_description: Zhipu AI provides the ChatGLM series of models.
Providers.baichuan_description: Baichuan Intelligence provides powerful Chinese LLMs.
Providers.moonshot_description: Moonshot AI provides the Kimi series of models.
Providers.minimax_description: MiniMax provides the ABAB series of models.
Providers.step_description: StepFun provides multimodal models with long context.
Providers.ollama_description: Ollama allows you to run open-source LLMs locally.
Providers.bedrock_description: Amazon Bedrock is a fully managed service that offers a choice of high-performing foundation models.
Providers.google_description: Google AI offers a wide range of AI services and models.
